solution_line_template: In one year, the rancher will have {initial_cows} + {initial_cows}/{growth_divisor} = {initial_cows} + {calves_born_year1} = <<{initial_cows}+{initial_cows}/{growth_divisor}={cows_after_one_year}>>{cows_after_one_year} cows.

In two years, the rancher will have {cows_after_one_year} + {cows_after_one_year}/{growth_divisor} = {cows_after_one_year} + {calves_born_year2} = <<{cows_after_one_year}+{cows_after_one_year}/{growth_divisor}={cows_after_two_years}>>{cows_after_two_years} cows.
